notice:
Hello! This is Wordsmith's new notice system.
I'll only use this in the future for important things like feature updates or discovered bugs.
With that in mind, here is a cool new feature to notice with this update!
You can now use /scratchpad (name) to create a scratchpad with a custom name! like /scratchpad Bartender

I fixed several bugs as well:
  * The close button in Settings will now listen to the 'Confirm Scratch Pad Delete' setting.
  * The web manifest and dictionary files will only be loaded a single time now instead of 3 times.
  * Fixed a bug that could cause 'Confirm Delete Scratch Pads' setting to get changed accidentally
